short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you use keyboard shortcuts on things on the YouVersion website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouVersion provides a very clean interface to read lots of bible versions, but one thing missing is keyboard shortcuts! This extension gives a twitter/social media like set of short cuts for quick navigation. I hope you like them!

This update v1.0.6 [Bug Fix]
Fixed issue where not being logged in has a different URL and page structure breaking J and L keys for going to next and previous passages.

Previous update v1.0.5 & 1.0.4
-Made loading resources more consistent at the expense of responsiveness. 
-Made invalid images hidden
-Added audio player label
-L key progresses a completed plan day!
